instruction: Create a short story driven by an emotion.
output: She was furious. All her hard work, her dedication and her determination had gone to waste, and now she was standing in the same spot she had been in the beginning. Nothing had changed. She pounded her fists against the wall in anger, determined to make a change. She was determined to show them that nothing could hold her back, that nothing could take away her dreams and ambitions. She was going to make it, no matter what it took.
